entry.title: Functional Programming
entry.content:
• FP help you to write code with explicit dependency
  • think more of data flow than control flow of imperitive programming
  • help to make failover easier and convinient
  • less likely to make mistakes when program with FP style
    Original post
entry.summary: FP help you to write code with explicit dependency think more of data flow than control flow of imperitive programming help to make failover easier and convinient less likely to make mistakes when program with FP style Original post
